titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain surviving spouses to exclude up to $500,000 of gain from the sale of a principal residence.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain surviving spouses to exclude up to $500,000 of gain from the sale of a principal residence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain surviving spouses to exclude from gross income up to $500,000 of the gain from the sale of their principal residences.
